definition: end/extremity/item/port/to hold sth level with both hands/to carry/regular

sentences.english: It's such a heretical idea that it's not even up for discussion.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個如此異端的想法，以至於它根本不會被討論。
或至少是屈從於某種異端學說？

sentences.english: May the Lord save us from all heresies.
sentences.chinese: 願主救我們從所有的異端裏出來。

sentences.english: Half-truth and hearsay was called truth.
sentences.chinese: 似是而非及異端邪說被視爲真理。

sentences.english: He is spreading this heresy everywhere .
sentences.chinese: 他要把異端邪說到處傳播。

sentences.english: Pucci: heresy is what *I* say it is.
Several heads were symbolic of decadence and oppression, and also of heresy.
sentences.chinese: 幾個頭是象徵性的衰落和壓迫，和並且異端邪說。
所有的這些都是異端邪說。

sentences.english: But will the embers of a different kind of heresy continue to burn?
sentences.chinese: 但不同種類的異端邪說的餘燼今後是否還會再燃？

sentences.english: The very idea of government regulation and oversight hadbecome heresy during this epoch.
sentences.chinese: 在這個時代，政府監管和監督已經成爲異端。

sentences.english: He modeled himself on Mencius while he was criticizing heterodoxy and keeping Confucianism traditions.
sentences.chinese: 他以孟子爲法，力闢異端，維護儒學傳統。

sentences.english: It might be considered heresy to suggest such a notion.
sentences.chinese: 提出這樣一個觀點可能會被視爲異端邪說。

sentences.english: 3quarters of the country follow superstitions and paganistic beliefs?
sentences.chinese: 四分之三的人口追隨迷信和異端信仰？

sentences.english: Continence is the foe of heresy.
sentences.chinese: 剋制是異端邪說的敵人。

sentences.english: Saint Theresa and Saint Jerome would be heretics.
sentences.chinese: 那麼，聖泰莉莎和聖熱羅姆豈不都成了異端了？

sentences.english: Do you realise Guardi is a heretic?
sentences.chinese: 你知道瓜爾迪是異端分子嗎？

definition: not the least bit concerned/completely indifferent
